DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to correlate Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) criteria for chronic pancreatitis with surgical pathology.
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) Features of Chronic Pancreatitis
DOC.criteria: Patients who are eligible are individuals who have: normal pancreas suspected chronic pancreatitis established chronic pancreatitis (by ERCP, MRI, previous EUS, CT) pancreatic cancer Patients who are not eligible are individuals who have: â€¢ an uncorrectable coagulopathy (platelet <50,000, INR>1.5), or bleeding disorder, or are unable to discontinue anticoagulation 57 days prior to EUS (aspirin and bridging therapy with lovenox are allowed, clopidogrel is not allowed)
